name: Fersese Zino
description: I am a simple and cool guy. I love life. I enjoy travelling and the great outdoors. I adore dogs, there is a special place in my heart for animals and nature. I am seeking my soulmate, the one I can’t live without. Someone to spend the rest of my life with. Distance is not an issue for me, I am willing to relocate if the need arises. I believe love has no comprehension of distance or state. I am seeking a loving, warm-hearted, romantic and humble lady
